snippet.title: Open Country Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
You're in the wild now! Make sure your backpack is stocked up because we're not in the city anymore. Get your rifle and ammo ready, and make sure you set up camp and a fire before the sun goes down...the wolves and bears are starving and you look like dinner.  The Ranger needs some guidance from a skilled outdoorsman, and Barry at the Snowridge Lodge could really use some more game to get him through the rough months. Are you up for the challenge of surviving in the Open Country?

WISHLIST on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1192010

Developed by FunLabs: Makers of the legendary Cabela’s Franchise, a modern twist on the exciting hunting genre!
 
- 2-PLAYER ONLINE CO-OP: Get a buddy and go for a hunt, or head to Snowridge Valley for a Ski-Mobile race

-        EXPLORE and LEARN: Every area of the map is beautiful and dangerous in its own way- be careful, the animals aren’t too excited to have a houseguest.

-  LEVEL UP: Better weapons, better equipment, and better vehicles -are you worthy of being called the Master Outdoorsman?
